meanings.definition: The quality or state of being a nerd.
meanings.sent1: Her nerdinesses showed in her love for science fiction.
meanings.sent2: His nerdinesses were evident in his extensive comic book collection.
meanings.sent3: Despite her nerdinesses, she was also a talented artist.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the nerdinesses of technology and gadgets.
meanings.sent5: The nerdinesses of his personality made him endearing to his friends.

meanings.definition: The behaviors or interests associated with being a nerd.
meanings.sent1: Their nerdinesses included coding and playing video games.
meanings.sent2: She embraced her nerdinesses by attending cosplay events.
meanings.sent3: His nerdinesses for collecting action figures knew no bounds.
meanings.sent4: The convention was a celebration of all things nerdinesses.
meanings.sent5: The group bonded over their shared nerdinesses for fantasy novels.
